article.title: Unlogged user view
article.para: While you are unlogged, you can see the basic elements of this application, which are described below.

section.title: Index
section.para: On this page the unlogged user can only switch to the login site or view courses and teachers by clicking on the respective link.
By clicking on the "courses" or "teachers" link, you get an overview of all courses and teachers respectively.

section.title: Teacher and student
section.para: For every teacher and student you can see their courses, which they have subscribed and lecture respectively.

section.title: Course
section.para: For every course you can see on the survey the lecturer and participants, who are the students. Moreover you can see on this survey all lessons of this course.

section.title: Lesson
section.para: For every lesson you can see its topic and problem definition respectively.

section.title: Login
section.para: If you are an student or teacher, you can login on this site.
